extendedInfo.description: Around is a social application based on GPS location. By selecting a defined range in km, you can interact with the users around you.Around Features:- Chat system- User profile- Photo gallery- Comments- Gps location reading- Range selection(km) for searching users- Invite notifications for: view chat, gallery, add as friend- 3 languages for the moment (italian, english, romanian)- Read user contacts, and if phone number registered in our database, add user as friend- Friend list- Block user functions- Notifications for user online and if user gets in your selected range

reviews.title: Well done!!
reviews.comment: Very nice App... I waited for a long time something like this to see all the cool people around me :) Thank\'s and good luck
reviews.author: A Google User
